sys_script_include.description: Filter user details to only be tenant's
sys_script_include.name: Tenant Filter

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_6b1acd0e2f521110b63859a72799b60d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_874730_icloud_re.Tenant Filter</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Filter user details to only be tenant's</description><name>Tenant Filter</name><script><![CDATA[var GetGroupMembers = Class.create();
GetGroupMembers.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},

	getUsers: function(){

		var arr = [];
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
		gr.addQuery("group.name", "Tenant");
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next()) {
			arr.push(gr.getValue('user'));
		}
		return arr.toString();

	},

	type: 'GetGroupMembers'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>777</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-04 00:12:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>6b1acd0e2f521110b63859a72799b60d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Tenant Filter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Icloud Real Estate" source="x_874730_icloud_re">a8b4523b2f061110b63859a72799b6b2</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Icloud Real Estate">a8b4523b2f061110b63859a72799b6b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6b1acd0e2f521110b63859a72799b60d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>777</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-04 00:12:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
